text: Roelof Johannes Nelissen (4 April 1931 – 18 July 2019) was a Dutch politician and businessman. He was a member of the Catholic People's Party (KVP) (now the Christian Democratic Appeal). Beste minister van Financiën (keuzelijst) He was born in Hoofdplaat, Netherlands. Nelissen was the Deputy Prime Minister from 1971 to 1973 and Minister of Finance at the same time during the Barend Biesheuvel ministry. He was the CEO of the AMRO Bank from 1983 to 1991. Nelissen died on 18 July 2019 in Hilversum, Netherlands at the age of 88.Oud- minister, fusiebankier en republikein Roelof Nelissen overleden ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Dutch bankers Category:Catholic People's Party politicians Category:Deputy Prime Ministers of the Netherlands Category:Dutch businesspeople Category:Dutch Roman Catholics Category:Members of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands Category:Government ministers of the Netherlands Category:Politicians from Zeeland
title: Roelof Nelissen
